Hero.title: Web Development That Drives Results
Hero.description: I build fast, responsive, and modern websites for small businesses, startups, and agencies. Get a website that looks professional, loads quickly, and helps your business grow.

Services.title: Web Development That Delivers
Services.description: I offer fast, high-quality web development using modern technologies like React and Next.js. From design to deployment — I’ve got you covered.

Technology.title: Technologies I Work With
Technology.description: I use a modern tech stack to build efficient, responsive, and high-performance web solutions. Every tool I use has been tested in real-world projects and helps deliver stable results in both front-end and back-end development.

History.title: How I Became a Web Developer
History.description: Every project in my portfolio is the result of personal growth, team collaboration, and continuous learning. From the first steps to commercial practice, I strive to create websites that not only look good but also work effectively.

Projects.title: Solutions Born from Ideas
Projects.description: Responsive landing pages, blogs, volunteer initiatives, and consulting platforms. Our projects include car services, education, charity, AI, and real estate. Mostly solo cases with unique design and fast delivery. Explore selected works or browse the full list.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.description: Ready to collaborate? I'm open to new projects and always happy to discuss your ideas. Write to me and I'll respond within 24 hours.
